text: Ia namakaba ko daruva egh gɨrakɨrangɨn gumazir igharazim mɨkɨman markɨ. Me gumazitam osɨmtɨzir ekiam bagh a isɨ kotiam datɨghtɨ, ia kotɨn an akurvaghamin gavgavim ikɨ, ia an akuragh. Ia uan akabar kuaghtɨ, kot suam, a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegh, kar bizir bar kuram. Ia an akuraghasa, kɨ ifonge. Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God.
